text: The flag of Medellín () has two horizontal stripes of white and green with the coat of arms of Medellín conceived by the emperor Carlos V in 1539 when was named Medellín. It was adopted 4 may 2021. ==Design and symbolism== Name Color HEX Code White #FFFFFF Green #009c3b ==References== Medellín Medellín Category:Flags with coats of arms Category:Medellín
title: Flag of Medellín, Antioquia
